title: paramAtmuni
sahitya:
paramAtmuni mAnasamuna bhAvinciti vara pIThamulOna vasiyimpa jEsiti


anupallavi



caraNam 1    hariki pannITa snAnamamara jEsiti sarika pItAmbaramu mereya kaTTiti
    caraNam 2    parimaLa gandhampumEna bAga bUsiti virula daNDayuramuna veleya vEsiti
    caraNam 3    muravairikinakaru dhUpamulanu vEsiti dharaNIpatiki dIpArAtanamu jEsiti
    caraNam 4    narahariki bhkSya bhOjanamulu peTTiti karuNatODa viDamosagi kALLupaTTiti
    caraNam 5    hamsatUlika talpamunanu hariniyunciti kamsavairi nidubOva kAli visariti
    caraNam 6    gOpAla dAsunutuni koniyADitini tApatrayamulanu bAsi dhanyudaitini
